summaries: This document is a Form 10-K report for Oracle Corporation, a large accelerated filer, for the fiscal year ending May 31, 2025. The report includes financial information and disclosures required by the Securities Exchange Act of 1934. The securities registered under Section 12(b) are Common Stock, par value $0.01 per share (trading symbol ORCL) and 3.125% senior notes due July 2025. No securities are registered under Section 12(g). The report indicates that Oracle Corporation has complied with all required filings during the preceding 12 months and for the past 90 days, and it has submitted every Interactive Data File required by Rule 405 of Regulation S-T. The report also includes an attestation of internal control over financial reporting under Section 404(b) of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act. As of May 31, 2025, the aggregate market value of the voting stock held by non-affiliates was $305,793,119,000, and the number of shares of common stock outstanding as of June 13, 2025, is 2,808,833,000. Portions of the definitive proxy statement relating to Oracle Corporation's 2025 annual meeting of stockholders are incorporated by reference into this report.
